about.details:
Founded in 1994, Solve Plastic Products Limited manufactures a comprehensive range of uPVC pipes (unplasticized polyvinyl chloride) and Rigid PVC electrical conduits and markets them under the brand name "BALCOPIPES"

The company has 3 manufacturing units in Kerala and 1 well-equipped manufacturing unit in Tamil Nadu. The products manufactured are approved by various authorities like Bureau of Indian Standards (BIS) and also by organizations like the Central Public Works Department (CPWD) of Chennai and Kochi, Military Engineer Services (MES), Integral Coach Factory, Public Works Department (PWD) of Kerala and Tamil Nadu and Tamil Nadu Housing Board. The company distributes its products mainly in the state of Kerala.

The company's product portfolio includes:

  • Solvent cement
  • Water tank
  • Garden hoses
  • Rigid PVC electrical cables PVC pipes

The company has a total of 165 employees (excluding the managing directors).

faqs.question: What is the Solve Plastic Products IPO?
faqs.answer:
Solve Plastic Products IPO is a SME IPO of 1302000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹11.85 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹91 per share. The minimum order quantity is 1200.

The IPO opens on August 13, 2024, and closes on August 16, 2024.

Integrated Registry Management Services Private Limited is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Solve Plastic Products IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Solve Plastic Products IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Solve Plastic Products IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Solve Plastic Products IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Solve Plastic Products IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Solve Plastic Products IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Solve Plastic Products IPO opens on August 13, 2024 and closes on August 16, 2024.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Solve Plastic Products IPO?
faqs.answer: Solve Plastic Products IPO lot size is 1200, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,09,200.

faqs.question: How to apply for Solve Plastic Products IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Solve Plastic Products IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Solve Plastic Products IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Solve Plastic Products IPO will be done on Monday, August 19, 2024, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Tuesday, August 20, 2024. Check the Solve Plastic Products IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Solve Plastic Products IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Solve Plastic Products IPO listing date is on Wednesday, August 21, 2024.
